title: Ep: 265: Why Do You REALLY Support That Candidate? The Psychology of Voting Behavior
description: Why do you vote the way you do? Have you read through all the various candidates position statements, or do you just kinda go with your "gut"? Jeremiah Sullins, Assistant Professor of Psychology at Harding University has looked at this question in great depth and he's found some really interesting answers to this question.  I think you'll really enjoy hearing about his research into your voting behavior.
